definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
"fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
to warm up (sports)/(fig.) to prepare/to get in condition

sentences.english: Thermal protector in motor will interrupt current when motor overheats .
sentences.chinese: 電機過熱時，熱保護器將會中斷電流。

sentences.english: One hot steak on a sizzlin' platter.
sentences.chinese: 一份熱牛排，還在盤子裏噝噝作響呢。

sentences.english: For flat glass, heat tempering is most often used.
sentences.chinese: 對於平板玻璃，熱退火是最常用的。

sentences.english: Heat surroundings cosiness index is a important target of energy efficiency design in buildings.
sentences.chinese: 熱環境舒適度指標是建築節能設計的關鍵之一。

sentences.english: It's very hot, sa the horseman decides to give the horses a bath.
sentences.chinese: 天氣非常熱，所以養馬人決定給馬兒們洗個澡。

sentences.english: Hardness was quiet different in different zone of fusion welding joint.
sentences.chinese: 熔焊接頭硬度分佈不均勻，熱影響區是薄弱環節。

sentences.english: The climate here is always hot, summer and winter alike .
sentences.chinese: 這裏的氣候總是那麼熱，夏季和冬季都一樣。

sentences.english: In chapter 4, the experiment of temperature-thermal Errors of CNC machine tools is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，主要論述了數控機牀熱誤差實驗。

sentences.english: Hot massage for a while, and then use a spoon to stimulate it to soak in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 熱按摩片刻後，再用一把泡在冷水裏的匙子刺激該處。

sentences.english: LUPIT benefited from very high ocean heat content and intensification rate has been fast.
sentences.chinese: 受惠於極高海面熱含量，盧碧增強的速度頗快。

sentences.english: The cause cause chalkiness clothes are not cooler is these you reflect the heat.
sentences.chinese: 白色衣服穿上去較量涼快的理由是反射熱。

sentences.english: I can't imaging why you are so hot, please wipe out sweat on your face.
sentences.chinese: 我不能想象你爲什麼那麼熱，請把臉上的汗水擦去。

sentences.english: Now I have a hot, wet car.
sentences.chinese: 於是現在我的車又溼又熱。

sentences.english: Adding milk to tea nullifies the heart-healthy benefits of the hot beerage , a new study suggests.
sentences.chinese: 一項最新研究表明熱奶茶不益於心臟健康。

sentences.english: Thermal-comfortable elastic polyurethane knitted fabrics may be manufactured by two methods.
sentences.chinese: 熱溼舒適性氨綸彈力針織面料可由兩種方法形成。

definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
